main event: A person reported seeing a bright object in the sky on 6/7/67 around 8:12 AM near Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 8 hours.
The object appeared solid, luminescent, and changed colors from white to blue, haze, orange, and green.
The object made no sound and its edges were sharply outlined.
The object did not appear to move behind or in front of anything.
The witness estimated the object was less than a mile away and moving at around 4 miles per second.
sighted object: a bright, solid, luminescent object that changed colors
